actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit removal of members of the National Credit Union Administration Board and the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation except for cause, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Financial Regulator Independence Protection Act - Amends the Federal Credit Union Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act with respect to the terms of office of the National Credit Union Administration Board and the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), respectively, to provide that each member shall: (1) serve a six-year term of office unless removed for cause by the President; and (2) continue to serve after the term expiration date until a successor is appointed and has qualified.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit removal of members of the National Credit Union Administration Board and the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation except for cause, and for other purposes.
